projects.name: Phone Store Website
projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce web application for a phone store, handling frontend and backend authentication features (secure login, registration, JWT-based session management), building responsive user interfaces with React, and implementing RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js for product management, user accounts, and order processing. Ensured secure authentication and authorization mechanisms, session handling, and smooth integration between frontend and backend services.

projects.name: Booking Ticket
projects.description: Developed a ticket booking system using Java, implementing core object-oriented principles and managing seat reservations, ticket availability, and user interactions. The system allowed users to search, book, and cancel tickets, while maintaining data integrity and concurrent access, applied refresh token rotation.

projects.name: Gmail Simulator
projects.description: Developed a Gmail-like email simulator using Flutter and Bloc for state management. Implemented real-time messaging features with WebSocket, including sending, receiving, and updating emails. Integrated with a Node.js backend and MongoDB for data storage, supporting search, notifications, and email management.
